metadata.synopsis: Jaheira has arrived inside the Moonrise Towers throne room after clearing the out all the enemies. If there are any Harpers alive, Jaheira will give them orders to patrol around the tower.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe mooassault_alive 1oe mooassault_cleartowerGo to and wait in the main throne room

0.speaker: Jaheira
0.text: Patrol this floor, Harpers. Watch the doors and watch the windows. Nothing enters or exits these rooms alive.
